Log in
February 2025 Edition
Zapier's latest
Explore the latest product updates and app news to automate your workflows.
What's new
Introducing Find & Replace in the Zap editor
Managing multiple Zaps just got easier. Now you can search and bulk replace field mappings and static text across your entire Zap, handling updates in seconds instead of clicking through every step.
Try it now
Unlock Formulas in Zapier Tables
Introducing formula fields in Tables! Automate calculations where your data lives-from sales commissions to revenue forecasts, create custom metrics and real-time insights for your business.
Get started with Formulas
SSO for Teams now available
Streamline access management give your team even more control with SAML Single Sign-On (SSO). Now included on our Teams plan at no extra cost!
Read the update
Spotlight
Automate Workforce operations with Workday
With our new Workday integration, you can automate repetitive, manual tasks and reclaim your time for strategic work.
Get started now →
OpenAI → ChatGPT: A More Powerful AI Integration
We're merging our OpenAI and ChatGPT integrations. Your Zaps will update automatically starting Feb 20-no action needed!
Learn more →
New and noteworthy apps
Highlighting 10 new integrations and 13 updates, including…
Slack
The Pushed Message trigger is back and better than ever! You can now share access to your push Zaps and use an alternate, public-friendly title.
Explore Slack integrations →
Docusign
With more than a dozen new features, including support for bulk sends, you'll spend less time chasing autographs.
Explore Docusign integrations →
Zapier Tables
Control how your Zaps interact with formula fields. Trigger Zaps from updated values, retrieve formula values, and calculate summary formulas via Zaps.
Explore Zapier Tables integrations →
Tentary
Tentary is an eCommerce platform for selling digital products, courses, and services.
Explore Tentary integrations →
Veriff
Veriff is an identity verification platform that automates fraud prevention and compliance to enhance user trust and safety.
Explore Veriff integrations →
Discover the latest
So many updates, so little space: Join the Zapier Community or visit our Help Center for even more product updates.
Got a question? Send us a message
